page.title: 02Television and Newspapers
page.content: My favourite TV programmes are those for children on ITV,also Â£Street Hawk' Â£Grange Hill' and Â£The Young Ones'on BBC. I watch the television when I get home from school and I watch it on Saturdays. Yes, I watch it all the time unless I have to go somewhere or do something else, but I donÂ£t watch it all that much because I have to go to bed at 8pm. I only read the papers to see what is on the TV or I just read a few things in the daily paper. All the newspapers that are free come through my door like the Chase Post, The Cannock Trader and the Cannock Chronicle. There used to be another local paper called the Cannock Advertiser but it was killed off by the give away papers. The papers that we have to pay for and fetch ourselves are The Sun and the evening paper called The Express and Star.
